references.paper_title: Supernormal: Neural surface reconstruction via multi-view normal integration
references.reason: This work is important as it is used to extract 3D posed scans for each frame as the posed-space ground truths, a crucial component of the dataset creation.

references.paper_title: ARCH++: Animation-ready clothed human reconstruction revisited
references.reason: This paper is a strong baseline for comparison, representing a feed-forward approach to producing animatable avatars.

references.paper_title: Rethinking atrous convolution for semantic image segmentation
references.reason: This paper is important because its DeepLabV3 backbone is used within the multi-frame encoder to extract high-resolution features.

references.paper_title: Adam: A method for stochastic optimization
references.reason: This paper introduces the Adam optimizer, the optimization algorithm used for training the model in both the canonical-space and posed-space stages.

references.paper_title: SCANimate: Weakly supervised learning of skinned clothed avatar networks
references.reason: This paper is important as a baseline and inspiration, optimizing personalized skinning weights and canonical shapes.
